description.narrative: By 2018, MAWF able to coordinate, plan, implement and monitor the WASH program, which contributes to Sanitation. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2018, stunting prevalence among children under 5 reduced nationally from current 29% to less than 20%.

NAMIBIAN WATER SUPPLY AND SANITATIO SECTOR PROGRAMME NAWASA

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2018, MAWF able to coordinate, plan, implement and monitor the WASH program

description.narrative: UNICEF enhanced capacity of four Government ministries to plan, implement, coordinate and monitor WASH program towards elimination of open defecation and promotion of good sanitation and hygiene practices in communities and schools. In 2018 three more villages were certified as open defecation free. | Status:Partially Met | As-of Date:27/12/2018
